creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Carol Brooks
description: somewhat forlorn looking figure holding tattered red robe together in front of body standing with feet slightly splayed apart; looking outward towards PL; large, gold hoop earring in PL ear; shaggy eyebrows and beard; large open eyes; shaggy hair around temples but bald head at top; very long toenails
title: Daruma and Two Landscapes (Daruma; one of a triptych)
